com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.shopping
Interface Discount

public interface Discount

A Discount to apply for a purchase. Tracks the value and type of the discount. The type can be a PercentOff or a TotalOff.

Nested Class Summary
static class Discount.Type
          The types of discounts that can be applied.
 
Method Summary

          Fetch the type of the discount.

          Set the type of the discount.

          Set the value of the discount.
